info.name: Sharing Vision - Article API
info.description: Collection for testing Article API Microservice - Sharing Vision 2023

request.description:
Endpoint to create a new article.

Validation:
- Title: minimum 20 characters
- Content: minimum 200 characters
- Category: minimum 3 characters
- Status: publish, draft, or thrash

Endpoint to display all articles with pagination.

Parameters:
- limit: number of data to display (10)
- offset: data starts from which index (0)

Endpoint to display article with specific ID.

Parameters:
- id: ID of the article to display

Endpoint to update article data.

Supported methods: PUT, PATCH, or POST

Parameters:
- id: ID of the article to update

Validation same as create article.

Endpoint to delete article by ID.

Parameters:
- id: ID of the article to delete
